entry.def: Mightily means to a great extent or degree.

example.ex: He had given a mightily impressive performance...
example.tran: 他的表演让人印象极为深刻。

example.ex: She strove mightily to put Mike from her thoughts.

sentences.sentence: "he strove mightily to achieve a better position in life"
